3:
n, k, p = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    if a[0] > b[0]:
        a, b = b, a
    time = 0
    i = 0
    j = 0
    while i < n and j < k:
        if a[i] < b[j]:
            time += a[i] - b[j]
            i += 1
            j += 1
        else:
            time += p - b[j]
            j += 1
    if i < n:
        time += a[i] - b[j]
    print(time)
8:
n, s, t = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    knapsacks = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    time = [0] * s
    for i in range(n):
        time[knapsacks[i]] += t
    print(min(time), max(time), sum(time) // s)
9:
n, s, t = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    k = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    k.sort()
    k.append(k[0])
    time = 0
    for i in range(n):
        time += k[i+1] - k[i]
    time += t
    time += s - k[n]
    print(time)
    print(time + t)
    print(time + t + s - k[n])

n = int(input())
    a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    b = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    a.sort()
    b.sort()
    if a[0] > b[0]:
        print(a[0] * 1000)
    else:
        print(b[0] * 1000)
15:
n = int(input())
    adj = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for _ in range(n-1):
        x, y = map(int, input().split())
        adj[x-1].append(y-1)
        adj[y-1].append(x-1)
    seq = list(map(int, input().split()))
    if len(seq) != n:
        print("No")
        return
    used = [False] * n
    q = [0]
    used[0] = True
    while q:
        v = q.pop(0)
        for u in adj[v]:
            if not used[u]:
                used[u] = True
                q.append(u)
    for i in range(n):
        if not used[i]:
            print("No")
            return
    print("Yes")
16:
n, m = map(int, input().split())
    songs = []
    for i in range(n):
        f, s = input().split()
        songs.append((int(f), s))
    songs.sort(reverse=True)
    songs = songs[:m]
    songs.sort(key=lambda x: x[1])
    for f, s in songs:
        print(s)
17:
n, m = map(int, input().split())
    songs = []
    for i in range(n):
        f, s = input().split()
        songs.append((int(f), s))
    songs.sort(reverse=True)
    q = []
    for i in range(n):
        z = songs[i][0] / sum(songs[j][0] for j in range(i + 1))
        q.append((songs[i][0] / z, songs[i][1]))
    q.sort(reverse=True)
    for i in range(m):
        print(q[i][1])
